snippet.title: 初星学園 Music Video Teaser
snippet.description:
▶Fighting My Way Movie Credits.
Illustrator : Murakaruki
Director : Rei Kurashima
Graphic Designer : Tomotaka Iwasa
CG Designer : Haruhiko Yamada
Supervisior : Naohiro Yako
Production : flapper3 Inc.

▶Luna Say Maybe Movie Credits.
Director & Character Designer & illustrator : jia
Compositor : ikumi
Animator : syoiti
Painter : Emma Aohara
Planner : Masaki Takahashi
Animation Producer : tete

▶Sekaiichi kawaii watashi Movie Credits.
Dirctor & composite : Syunsuke Yasumura
illustration & Animation : Sansaki

▶clumsy trick Movie Credits.
illustration : Hamafugu
Design : Tamano Hazuki
Composite : konbu

▶Tame-Lie-One-Step Movie Credits. 
Producer : Yamato Kosahata (cresco motion design) /  Takamu Chuganji (BaSICA.inc)
Director : Hiromi Yamaguchi (cresco motion design)
CG Designer : Yuki Inoue (cresco motion design)
Illustrator : Yamaharu (cresco motion design)
Illustrator : Kanji Furuyama (cresco motion design)
Production manager : Natsuki Miyasaka (centean)
Production manager : Kana Hayano (centean)

▶Koukei Movie Credits. 
director & animator : Wataru Uekusa
animators : Hiroshi Sakai / Fujishima Kei
background artists : Hikagami Hinami / moge
logo & prop design : Hikagami Hinami
text design : Totorika

▶Hakusen Movie Credits.
illustration : Akira Kamogawa
Design : nagum
Composite : NaGi

▶Wonder Scale Movie Credits.
Producer : Takamu Chuganji（BaSICA.inc）
Director : Tetsuya Tatamitani
Character Design : Saeko Suzuki
Live 2D Animation : Ra Yumi
Animation : Bjurhager Linda / Saeko Suzuki
Animation Studio : pH studio
Background : Nagiya
Effect Animation : Tetsuya Tatamitani
CG Designer & Composite : ANGELO

▶Fluorite Movie Credits.
Director & Animator & Storyboard : 2z2
Animators : Haruka Suzuki / Nowoka
3DCG & Motion Graphics : yonayona graphics

------------------------------
Music Label : ASOBINOTES
MV Producer : Takuya Negawa
------------------------------
